items.content_html: This project is a lightweight Node.js wrapper for the Musixmatch API, making it super easy to fetch lyrics, track info, and artist details. Perfect for music apps, Discord bots, or settling lyric-based arguments with friends.
items.title: sh13y/Musixmatch: This project is a lightweight Node.js wrapper for the Musixmatch API, making it super easy to fetch lyrics, track info, and artist details. Perfect for music apps, Discord bots, or settling lyric-based arguments with friends.

items.content_html: metaOG is a lightweight Node.js utility that fetches Open Graph (OG) metadata from a given URL. It can be used in web applications to display link previews, such as titles, descriptions, and images, by extracting OG tags from the target web page.
items.title: hheinsoee/metaOG: metaOG is a lightweight Node.js utility that fetches Open Graph (OG) metadata from a given URL. It can be used in web applications to display link previews, such as titles, descriptions, and images, by extracting OG tags from the target web page.

items.content_html: tansu is a lightweight, push-based framework-agnostic state management library. It borrows the ideas and APIs originally designed and implemented by Svelte stores and extends them with computed and batch.
